title: Back on the Road With Brandon Flowers and Ronnie Vannucci Jr. of the Killers (Ep. 187)
description:
Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald are joined by Killers bandmates Brandon Flowers and Ronnie Vannucci Jr., who discuss getting the band back together for a new album, meeting your heroes, and the business of making music.

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
